review_discussion.author: proux01
review_discussion.comment:
```suggestion
Lemma leq_half_double m n : (m./2 <= n) = (m <= n.*2.+1).
Proof. by case: m => [|[|m]] //; rewrite ltnS ltn_half_double. Qed.
```
